comment:
* A MultiChoiceModeListener receives events for {@link AbsListView#CHOICE_MODE_MULTIPLE_MODAL}.
     * It acts as the {@link ActionMode.Callback} for the selection mode and also receives
     * {@link #onItemCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode, int, long, boolean)} events when the user
     * selects and deselects list items.

methods.name: public void onItemCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode mode, int position, long id, boolean checked)
methods.comment: * Called when an item is checked or unchecked during selection mode. * * @param mode The {@link ActionMode} providing the selection mode * @param position Adapter position of the item that was checked or unchecked * @param id Adapter ID of the item that was checked or unchecked * @param checked true if the item is now checked, false * if the item is now unchecked.

methodNames: public void onItemCheckedStateChanged(ActionMode mode, int position, long id, boolean checked)
